title: Boris Johnson admitted to hospital as Queen urges co-operation during COVID-19 pandemic - The Globe and Mail
description: ‘Together we are tackling this disease and I want to reassure you that if we remain united and resolute then we will overcome it,’ the Queen said
content: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's admission to hospital was announced just after a special broadcast by the Queen seen here being viewed by Peter and Kate Beresford and family members on April 5, 2020 in which she urged Britain and the Commonwealth to wo… [+5610 chars]
